desc: 意大利女婿 🇮🇹～香港製造 🇭🇰～ 每日新鮮自家製🍅無添加、無防腐劑、無味精 輕鬆在家煮出正宗意國家鄉風味 🍝 Made Fresh Daily in Hong Kong! A quick and easy way to enjoy the most authentic taste of Italy in the comfort of your own home! No preservatives, No additives, No MGC a healthy option for you and your loved ones. 🍝
